item.description:
Leah highly recommends this:

Do you dread networking and sometimes avoid it despite how critical it is to your career or business goals? It can be fun and easy -- even for introverts!

Join career and business coach Val Nelson for a workshop where you'll learn the four secrets to making networking easy and effective, develop your unique networking plan, and come away with relaxed shoulders.

Val Nelson has over 25 years of professional experience working in marketing, communications, and health and human services. Through her coaching, speaking engagements, workshops, and blog, she helps people clarify and activate their superpowers. And as an introvert, she loves helping other introverts.

6:00 - 6:30PM Registration and hors d'oeuvres
6:30 - 8:00PM Presentation and interactive workshop
8:00 - 8:30PM Networking
Memorial Hall, UMass Amherst Campus

I am posting here to help people from this group to recognize each other and coordinate
but please Register here:

Admission: $7 UMass Amherst alumni; free for current UMass Amherst students; $10 non-alumni
Event Web page
item.why: This is the rescheduled workshop that was originally set for Feb. 2nd.

group.name: Northampton Web Developers/ Web Designers Meetup Group

item.name: Workshop: Networking Secrets from an Ex-Wallflower - in 3-D!
